official.headline: Amnesty Announced
official.anchor_line: Council grants citywide amnesty for all previous Behavioral Compliance Index, or BCI, offenses.
official.contextual_reframing: This initiative ensures every resident can access vital services and participate fully in city life without legacy restrictions.

official.headline: Hope Restored
official.anchor_line: Thousands apply for BCI record clearing as hope and gratitude sweep communities.
official.contextual_reframing: The amnesty reflects the state’s commitment to fairness and system-wide renewal, strengthening trust among citizens.

official.headline: Order Prevails
official.anchor_line: Celebrations and calm greet the amnesty as communities focus on improvement and unity.
official.contextual_reframing: Maintaining systemic balance and public confidence is a core function of Stenograd’s advanced automated governance.

underground.headline: Fake Amnesty
underground.anchor_line: Council’s amnesty wipes old BCI flags, but new ones appear just as fast.
underground.contextual_reframing: The Behavioral Compliance Index, or BCI, was built to watch us. Even when they offer forgiveness, quotas rule. For each cleared record, someone else gets flagged instead.

underground.headline: Records For Sale
underground.anchor_line: Thousands line up to beg for cleared records, but nothing really changes.
underground.contextual_reframing: People think the system forgives, but it just shuffles the punishment around. In Stenograd, trust can be revoked in a heartbeat by an algorithm most never see.

underground.headline: Hope Hijacked
underground.anchor_line: The city celebrates ‘amnesty,’ but the system stays in charge and dissent grows underground.
underground.contextual_reframing: Temporary relief is no freedom. The Council’s automated control loops anticipate, adapt, and silence except when we make noise they can’t predict.
